DOC.brief_summary: Assess the role of a nicotine antagonist in helping patients presenting to hospital with acute coronary syndrome to stop smoking.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of the Novel Selective Nicotinic Receptor Partial Agonist, CHANTIX (Varenicline) in Patients With Acute Coronary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: active smokers presenting to hospital with an acute coronary syndrome patients with an acute coronary syndrome who are not active smokers
